授業目的: Continuing the spring semester class, the course will continue to pursue its objective to teach and make students acquire fundamental study and academic skills necessary for successfully completing undergraduate studies at the School of International Studies.
到達目標: The goal is to make students acquire study and academic skills like searching for materials, evaluating materials, making notes, compiling reference lists, preparing presentations, arguing and discussing issues in an academic way, writing reports etc. on a more advanced level than in the spring term.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This class will be conducted face-to-face. Students not able to come to Japan will take part in the class online. Students living in countries with a large time difference, will follow the class by watching the videos taken in class each time.
Seminar format. Each class will pursue one task, which we will try to commonly achieve. There will be sufficient guidance and explanations given, on which students will then have to do various exercises.
